Datasource.Parameter: (SELECT way, way_area AS area FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landuse IN ('residential', 'commercial', 'retail')) AS data
(SELECT way, way_area AS area, name FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE aeroway IN ('aerodrome') OR landuse IN ('industrial')) AS data
(SELECT way, way_area AS area FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE "leisure" IN ('park', 'playground', 'pitch', 'golf_course') OR landuse IN ('recreation_ground', 'grass', 'cemetery')) AS data
(SELECT way, way_area AS area FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE "natural" IN ('wood', 'scrub') OR landuse IN ('forest')) AS data
(SELECT way, way_area AS area FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE "natural" IN ('wetland')) AS data
(SELECT way, waterway AS type, name FROM planet_osm_line WHERE waterway IN ('river', 'canal', 'stream', 'ditch') AND tunnel IS NULL AND (layer NOT IN ('-1', '-2') OR layer IS NULL)) as DATA

(SELECT way, way_area AS area, name FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE "natural" IN ('water', 'pond') OR waterway IN ('basin', 'canal', 'mill_pond', 'pond', 'riverbank', 'stream') OR landuse IN ('reservoir', 'basin')) AS data
(SELECT way, way_area AS area FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE "natural" IN ('glacier')) AS data
(SELECT way, name, ele FROM planet_osm_point WHERE "natural" IN ('peak')) as DATA
( SELECT way, "building" AS type, way_area AS area FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE building NOT IN ('0','false', 'no') ORDER BY ST_YMin(ST_Envelope(way)) DESC ) AS data
